 2024-08282024-06-21JUS
ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of Absence for the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program from September 1, 2024 to April 30, 2025.
PrecisOrder approving a LEAVE OF ABSENCE for two judges from September 1, 2024 to April 30, 2025 to participate in the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving a LEAVE OF ABSENCE for two judges from September 1, 2024 to April 30, 2025 to participate in the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program.
